website_summaries.verdict: A solid farm set with lots of pieces for imaginative play.
pros: 100% recycled materials proudly displayed on the hood
Good sized pieces, even for small children
Kids will enjoy this barn as they grow
Handle on top makes the barn easy for a child to carry
All the pieces can fit inside the barn for storage
cons: All of the pieces can fit in the barn, but there is no gate on the upper level to hold the pieces in place

customer_reviews.title: Great classic toy.
customer_reviews.text: My one year old LOVES the Green Toys that come with the little characters. We got this for him to play with his characters. He loves opening and closing the doors and putting the characters in and out of the building. I like the lack of noises and music versus the popular toy brand barn. The plastic is thick and sturdy. A great classic.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy brand, adorable toy your kids will love!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the cutest barn set! Im a bit obsessed with farms and farm toys so I was checking them out and reading reviews for awhile. Im also super picky about the toys I give my kiddos. I try to avoid plastics but I trust Green Toys. The red barn is adorable, it has a handle at the top to be carried and a few doors to open and close. The farmers are cute little cows wearing hats and overalls and they fit in the tractor. You can fit everything in the barn for storage. I have no complaints, my little loves this just as much as I do! Entertained my big kids for quite a while too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, as usual !
customer_reviews.text: I love Green Toys products ! This farm set is very nice, sturdy and durable just as usual. The only thing I don't like is the little characters, as some other buyers mentionned : you get 2 pigs, 2 sheeps, and 2 "cow farmers". I took the farmers off the set, and had more animals from another brand. I don't really like the fact that the farmers are animals too, I would have prefer a little boy and a little girl for example.
customer_reviews.author: Mélodie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great barn! We love green toys!
customer_reviews.text: We have become a green toy house with more than half a dozen green toys now. This farm set is so perfect. I put a picture on here to show size because that is really the only thing i can see people complaining about because it is compact. The picture is with the green toy rocket and one picture with a pencil. All the pieces fit nicely inside for clean up!
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMom

customer_reviews.title: Quality product made from recycled milk bottles
customer_reviews.text: This farm set arrived in time for my grandson's 1st birthday and it was a hit! I love that it is made from recycled milk bottles (in fact this is my 3rd toy made by Green Toys!) The "plastic" is thick, durable, and has a smooth texture that is perfect for my grandson. My 4 granbabies ranging in age from 1-6 all enjoyed playing with it and it survived! The faces on the farmer cows, the sheep, & pigs are cutely detailed. The barn has 2 floors and multiple doors. The truck is very sturdy just like my other green toys are. I will definitely buy Green Toys for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Pjhrab

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was $19 when I got this so I’m very happy. I’m not sure about paying more than that... my daughter likes playing with the green toys figures because she likes to put figures in her fingers. Green toys are so simple I don’t have to worry about getting dirty I can just wash them. I wish there were more animals for this set. And I don’t understand you used a box package for fence parts but why would you use plastic net for figures package?? If you care about recycle please don’t use plastic for package that’s just another plastic trash you are creating.
customer_reviews.author: Yuririn

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough to display, perfect for play!
customer_reviews.text: We only have good things to say about our Green Toys toys! I personally love that they’re kiddish without being obnoxious. I actually enjoy displaying these toys! As far as play, this barn has been my 20 month old’s favorite toy since we got it! It’s simple and cute! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kalena

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for two year olds!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little farm. My two year old got this for Christmas and he is OBSESSED! He sings "Old McDonald" all day and loves parking the little truck in the barn. It is easy to clean up because everything fits in the barn and it has a handle so I can grab it on the go. Also, as a parent, I feel good about giving my kids products that are recycled.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She loves to push the truck around and put the pig in the back. The reason for 4 stars is the description states it all fits inside the barn, and while that is true, you cannot carry it without the doors opening and the toys falling out.
customer_reviews.author: debra hines

customer_reviews.title: Great, well made set
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with the Little Green Toy characters and brings them everywhere he goes. We bought this toy when he was 27 months old and he wasn't that into it. It was exciting the first day, and he still plays with the little bears that were included but he is not interested in the train anymore. I wish I had purchased this when he was 1-1.5; he would have played with it much more at that age.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Quality, cute, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute set, we ended up returning only because we had so many "farm" sets gifted already by the time my daughter was too get this one. If I had any reason to keep it I would have, it was much cuter in person. Felt well made with sturdy materials, the size was nice too, easy to let a child take here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley linder

customer_reviews.title: Great barn set!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome barn set! I love that it comes with a truck. It is a great size, big enough to play with but still small enough that it is easy to put it away when the kids are not using it. My only complaint is I wish it came with more animals not just the two sheep and two pigs but you can always get an animal set to add to it later.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Best toy barn for babies/toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-constructed toy that’s great for imaginative play and helps with our child’s therapy goals! It’s a great size for play but doesn’t take up too much space. We also use our barn with FP’s Little People animals. I prefer the design of FP’s LP animals to the ones included, the all-yellow farmer cow is a bit odd when we’re trying to help our child connect real animals to a more abstract form. I’m very glad we made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Barn
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter’s second birthday. The barn is very sturdy and durable, and I love the doors that close to help keep items inside (reason I ultimately picked this barn set). The animals as part of the set are not impressive, so we got other animals. But, we couldn’t beat this barn for the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! I got it for my son's first Christmas gift and it's so cute! Looks like it's made of good quality recycled plastic and the animals are super cute. I think he'll love playing with this when he gets a little older!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: One word: Love
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a farm toy that I am happy about gifting! This farm set is simple: animals, tractor, two farmers, some fencing and the barn. Easy for a 2 year old to handle! The quality is durable, easy to wipe down if need be. If you want a happy farmer, buy this farm!! I love a Green Toy and so did my G-baby.
customer_reviews.author: JusBe

customer_reviews.title: So much fun farm
customer_reviews.text: This is like the 12th Green Toy I've bought. They are so high quality in addition to being a responsible company! Go Green Toys! All other manufacturers could learn from you. Please keep making more toys! Also please adjust molds to make side barn door accomodate the animals and the barn a little bigger so the truck completely fits. I would buy again and for gifts. This company makes the best quality toys out there.
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a fun set
customer_reviews.text: I got this set when I saw the price dropped, and quickly purchased it. My daughter was excited when she first saw it but quickly lost interest :( The items seem to be very well made though!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Minero

customer_reviews.title: We love green toys!
customer_reviews.text: Green toys are by far the best toys for babies, toddlers and young kids. They're sturdy and remind me of classic children's toys. We have a full box of green toys at home but this cute little barn is definitely a favorite!
customer_reviews.author: CountryMama777

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy and so do all my kids (4,3, and 9 months). It's simple and classic. We avoid the push button toys and this is absolutely perfect. Played with everyday. The toddlers love setting up the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Lady V

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this toy set. We took out the fence because it was just very stabby, but he loves playing with the figures, opening and closing the doors, and trying to jam all of his little toys into the barn. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy made from recycled materials!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Green Toys Farm! My grandson is too little to play with it yet, but I am sure he will love it. There are lots of animals included, some fences, and a little truck. You can fit 2-3 of the figures in the back of the truck. The doors of the barn open (there are doors on the front and another on set on the back, so the kids can play from both sides. Very well made, colors are bright and fun!
customer_reviews.author: DZKimmi

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid toy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toy set for my 23 month old daughter. So far she likes it - mostly for the barn. The toys are a large enough size that I'm not worried about her choking on any of them and they are durable enough that I'm not concerned she'll break them anytime soon. As other posters mentioned, it is a little odd the truck doesn't fit inside the barn to where you can close the barn doors completely, however at this time that hasn't proved to become an issue for us yet. In the interest of saving space, it would be nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: GREEN TOYS are the BEST TOYS!
customer_reviews.text: We adore Green Toys in our family. They are always so sturdy and well-made, easy to clean, and they are so fun to play with. I especially appreciate that the packaging is simple and easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! It’s the perfect size for toddlers and preschoolers. Fits Little People animals as well
customer_reviews.author: karen musclow

customer_reviews.title: my 12-14 months old daughter love it
customer_reviews.text: We have several toys from this company and I like many aspects such as recycled milk jugs, safe chemicals/colors, made in USA, and just all-around quality made. My daughter loves playing with all the pieces and it looks like she may enjoy it for at least another year.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Love these toys!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set one of these I've bought. I got one for a grandchild, and my great-nieces loved it so much that I had to get them one, too. Great quality and look durable. And the kids love it! I've gotten several green toys brand items, Nd every one m has been fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: stylingmom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my child's first birthday. He is now 4, and I cannot tell you how impressed I have been with this. My child plays very rough with his toys, and this has held up to all of his rough play for years. It has brought him a lot of joy, and us as well being as it is so durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: great color and great fun! my 1 1/2 year old grandson loves this toy, it has enough pieces to keep his imagination busy for awhile. It's made really well.
customer_reviews.author: PatBerger

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy! We gave it to him for his first birthday. He enjoys opening the doors and carrying around the fence rails. He isn't playing with the figures yet, they are a potential choking hazard, so they are put away for now. The toy is nicely made and it's wonderful that it is made from recycled milk cartons.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina - Goleta, CA

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but overpriced most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but I feel it is way over priced most of the time. I saw it on here this summer for about $24 and was livid as we spent almost double that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun to play with...
customer_reviews.text: 12 month old absolutely adores this playset. Loves opening and closing all the doors. I do monitor him playing closely since he still like putting things in his mouth. The pieces are very well made and sturdy. Got it on sale and it was definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Love green toy farm set!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 2 1/2 year old for Christmas and he loved it! I love that you can close it up and it has a handle to carry for travel if needed. We love all green toys products. They hold up really well and love that they are made from recycled milk jugs.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Flores

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this barn. He received it as a gift when he was about 1.5 and he is still playing with it a year later!! He has dropped this soooo many times without a problem. Very sturdy! The farm truck is not that fun for him, he loves the barn doors. He puts all kinds of toys in it and plays for hours. This set was on sale once for $25 and I bought one to keep at his grandparents house (that's how much he loves it).
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my one year old. I'm a big fan of Green Toys and this Farm Playset does not disappoint. All of the pieces are made well. Great playset for toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, and fun
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute farm set. My son loves opening the doors and dropping things in while on it's side. I wish there cows weren't dressed like farmers.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Farming Made Fun
customer_reviews.text: This little farm set is adorable. I like that they use recycled materials to make it and the packaging can be recycled. It's easy to store and seems durable. The colors of the barn and little truck are bright. I would recommend this toy set.
customer_reviews.author: R G

customer_reviews.title: Such a great toy set!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great toy set!! It's nostalgic like the ones from when I was small yet safe, green, and more streamlined in appearance. You can't beat the recycled plastic and safety features. This was also $20 cheaper on Amazon than any other online realtors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: A great set that came with plenty of pieces. Everything fits in the barn and can be carried around. Kids are enjoying playing with it. Love the green toys brand and this set didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry

customer_reviews.title: Best play barn.
customer_reviews.text: Great brand. Very durable and our kids love them. So easy to clean - in the sink, dishwasher, or with the garden hose. Great for indoor and outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B

customer_reviews.title: loving farm life
customer_reviews.text: !8 month old grandson-squeeled when he open this carried around various characters and loved making them disappear in the barn. A great find!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: gift for 1st time parents
customer_reviews.text: I personally like Doug and Melissa or Fisher Price products , that being said for the new generation who love plastic eco friendly toys this product fits the bill
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two-year-old for Christmas. Excellent quality and vintage feel! My son loves opening and closing the doors, pushing the truck through the barn, and playing with the accessories. Great toy for imaginative play!
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Girl

customer_reviews.title: somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cows are dorky, solid yellow. I wish it had a farmer/wife for driving the truck and cows that looked like cows.
customer_reviews.author: Optomisty

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this farm house! We use Schleich toys with it and they for perfectly. I got it for my daughter when she was 19 months. She is still playing with it, at almost 3 years old. Love the handle on top. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danae

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Green Toys line. These don't have super small parts so my 9 month old can chew on it. My 6 yr old has enjoyed it as well I love that it's made in the USA and out of recycled materials. beyond satisfied and I will be getting more of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Watkins

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas gift and can’t wait to give it. Paid only $18! Cheapest price around for sure! Love green toys for their quality and ingredients. Only complaint- how is a cow a farmer to pigs and sheep? Overthinking I guess.
customer_reviews.author: brian o.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Xmas gift idea! Love it it’s so cute and it’s a little smaller than I thought so that’s even better I just can’t see my son playing with a big bulky toy. It’s so cute I love this whole brand of toys!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for church nursery. Toddlers love it! Well made with good play value
customer_reviews.author: T. Canada

customer_reviews.title: Two year old’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. He comes back to it again and again. He’s had it since he turned one, and he’s two and a half now and has loved it all along. He loves opening and closing the doors, putting the truck inside the barn, and moving the little animals all around. We have lots of toys, and this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my daughters favorite toys to play with. The animals are a great size and having the barn and pickup is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Breault

customer_reviews.title: Green, Clean, Farming machine.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy! Green, clean and a farming machine. My grandbaby will love this. Packaged beautifully. Great price. Thank you for making such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: mtodd50

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two year old son birthday! He loves and it and so do his older sisters!
customer_reviews.author: DMK.MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: A Three Year Old's Favorite Farm
customer_reviews.text: I loved watching my nephew play with this farm set. The barn was easy to carry and he took it and the farmer and all the animals with him around the house and created adventures for them. They pieces are big enough that they don't get lost and they spark young imaginations. What else could you want in a toy farm?.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Great for little toddler
customer_reviews.text: Totally exceeds my expectation! It's huge, sturdy and well quality. Safe for my 8-month-old. He loves banging the barn and opens the door. It also fits with other animal figures too.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, never let down with this company. Great unisex gift!
customer_reviews.author: alexandra cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys is one of our most favorite brand of kids toys! Super durable hard plastic that can handle rough play. We gave this to our 1 year old for his birthday and both he and our 4 1/2 year old son love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Crash12

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old but my 4 year old plays with it as much if not more. Good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Nice, non-electronic toy for kids with imagination. Not quite five-stars because the animals are not very cute or interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Acontius

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are literally the best. I love all the green toys for my son! The colors are wonderful and it’s a really durable toy for my toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Jodeci

customer_reviews.title: Good bribe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a bribe for my son to poop on the potty. Took about 2 months but it finally did the trick. Love green toys, have many. Very durable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a spur of the moment Christmas present for my 16 month old daughter. Technically it's designed for older children, but she loves it and plays with it correctly! Everything is sturdily built, and I trust it to stand up to her antics (as well as the use of many more children to come). The only issue I had is with the Farmer COWS? Why not humans? It's a little wrong that the Cows have pet sheep and pigs, just saying...
customer_reviews.author: CmdrsWifey

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with this toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my four year old great-grandson... he absolutely loves it! it is a quality toy, not some cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: AngelHugs4JC

customer_reviews.title: Cows with hats
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved the set however she didnt understand why the cows were the farmers. So she only plays with the other animals
customer_reviews.author: gumygum

customer_reviews.title: Made to last!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than Fisher Price, and we love little people! This is made to last!
customer_reviews.author: SkiAlly

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son whos autistic as he uses this daily at ABA therapy & now all 3 of my kids are hooked on this toy
customer_reviews.author: Faaea

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: This will be for a Christmas present. It looks nice! First time trying the green toys products. Will update!
customer_reviews.author: Tina C

customer_reviews.title: Great for pretending!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a two-year-old but her five-year-old sister enjoyed it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Love Green Toys!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are the best! Anything we ever buy from them is great. High quality and well made. Plus they use recycled milk cartons to make the toys! No batteries is a plus for parents and kids!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gerbino

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 month old loves it! So fun and cute, she loves driving the tractor around with the little animals in it. We liked the recyclable packaging and that the product itself is made of recycled material.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the waiting room of our dental clinic and kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 yo loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yo can't stop playing with this. Awesome toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: LizMD555

customer_reviews.title: The barn and all the animals are still available after all these years.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this online and couldn't believe this product is still being manufactured. My sisters played with this toy in the 1950s. It's still well made and loads of fun. Kids can use their imagination and pretend to be farmers. And for us city folk, this is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Farm
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, durability, the car is a perfect size. Easy to store and travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G.

customer_reviews.title: Happy barnyard play
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this. Plays constantly with her barn toys and fences🌷🌷🌷
customer_reviews.author: Jan Person Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This toy set has been great for my 2-year old. I'm extremely happy with the ease of use and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wanzi

customer_reviews.title: Made really well!
customer_reviews.text: Farm made really well. My grandson is going to love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very lite!
customer_reviews.text: My 18-month old daughter absolutely loves this and its lite enough for her to carry!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Meaux

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s “must buy toys “ for 2-4 yrs kids!!! My 2 boys love this set and play pretend game every day with it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and well constructed. Lots of little doors to open, which keeps my toddler busy. He’s played with it regularly for months now. Love Green Toys!!
customer_reviews.author: olgavrealtor

customer_reviews.title: Toys made from recycled plastic
customer_reviews.text: Love love love green toys, have ordered car carrier, helicopter, fire truck and many other green toy products. Perfect for little hands. My 2 year old grandsons favorite go to toys. Very well made. I especially like the way toys do not scratch my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: janice lake forest

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our classroom
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My students love it! Sturdy and durable. Nice addition to our classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthanne Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys are great!
customer_reviews.text: As always, Green Toys are great! I have bought them for all of my grandchildren. We like the quality and that the are made out of recycled plastics. Win Win! The new little farm set was a big hit! I will continue to give them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Peace Frog Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys Farm Playset
customer_reviews.text: Really great farm playset! Love this company and all their products
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my granddaughters favorite barn toys! Very sturdy construction!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality play barn
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing with the barn doors. She likes to put her animal figurines in and out of the barn. I gave away the animals that came in this set because they aren’t realistic at all, but the barn alone was worth the purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: BaroqueMin

customer_reviews.title: farm house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift. My son loves it. Durable and fun
customer_reviews.author: Mcb546

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Bought this for my soon to be 2 year old. He is going to love it! Also very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Ross&co

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, eco-friendly, and made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It’s made in the USA from recycled plastic, not made in China from regular plastic. Even the packaging is plastic free. And it’s well-made, better than the Chinese junk found everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recyclable Toy
customer_reviews.text: Well made out of recycled material. Made in USA! Wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Great farm set!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our 20-month old son and he loves it. Uses it with some of our other Green Toys products. We love Green Toys - great company and solid, kid-friendly products!
customer_reviews.author: Customer 8910

customer_reviews.title: Farming Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he absolutely loves it. I was a big hit with him and his friends with hours of imaginative playtime. Gma
customer_reviews.author: Linda Te

customer_reviews.title: High quality & Made to last!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 7 children and have bought many toys over the years. This brand and line of toys are the best quality toys we have ever found! They are made real heavy duty and can last even the roughest play! Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: VStoppel

customer_reviews.title: my childs favorite toy

product_meta.title: Green Toys Farm Playset
product_meta.description: It's a busy day on the Green Toys Farm! Inspiring cooperative play and communication, this playset includes a barn, pick-up truck, farmer cow characters, sheep, pigs, fences, and a hog shed for endless imaginative play. As little ones help the farmer cows open and close the barn doors, corral the pigs, and load the sheep in the back of the pick-up truck, they also develop fine motor skills and coordination. All pieces fit inside the barn, so clean-up and storage is a breeze, and the built-in handle makes it easy to take all the fun on-the-go. Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic with no BPA, phthalates, or PVC. Dishwasher safe. Packaged with recycled and recyclable materials printed with soy inks.
